mapper.insert: insert into tb2_comment (board_id, userid, comment, wdate) values (#{board_id}, #{userid}, #{comment}, now())
mapper.select: select A.userid, comment, A.wdate, A.id, username, board_id from tb2_comment A left outer join member B on A.userid=B.userid where board_id=#{board_id}
select A.userid, comment, A.wdate, A.id, username, board_id from tb2_comment A left outer join member B on A.userid=B.userid where A.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update tb2_comment set comment = #{comment} where id=#{comment_id}
